mapper.select: SELECT b.rm_num, b.bk_date, b.bk_days, r.rm_name, r.rm_nprice, r.rm_price, r.rm_min_prs, r.rm_max_prs FROM booking_tbl b, room_tbl r WHERE b.rm_num = #{rm_num} AND b.rm_num = r.rm_num ORDER BY b.bk_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_tbl (bk_code, rm_name, bk_date, bk_days, bk_adult, bk_child, bk_infant, bk_option, bk_total, rm_num, bk_name, email, bk_phone, em_phone, room_prce, pers_prce) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(bk_code) ), 0)+1 FROM booking_tbl), #{rm_name}, #{bk_date}, #{bk_days}, #{bk_adult}, #{bk_child}, #{bk_infant}, #{bk_option}, ${bk_total}, #{rm_num}, #{bk_name}, #{email}, #{bk_phone}, #{em_phone}, #{room_prce}, #{pers_prce} )
